definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: So that's our initial entropy in this simple model.
sentences.chinese: 所以那是这个简单模型中的初始熵。

sentences.english: Additionally, enthalpy and entropy both contributed to enantioseparation when mobile phase was acetonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 流动相为纯乙腈时，焓和熵对对映体的拆分均有贡献。

sentences.english: The obtained value of heterogeneous index with entropy weight method can quantitatively reflect the heterogeneity of reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 熵权非均质指数的大小能定量表征储层的非均质性。

sentences.english: The magnetic entropy changes were the benchmark for the application of the magnetocaloric materials.
sentences.chinese: 磁熵变化值是衡量磁制冷材料好坏的一项重要指标。

sentences.english: Thermodynamic optimization of insulation for pipe like surface based on entropy generation analysis is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 基于熵产分析，时管状表面绝热层进行热力学优化。

sentences.english: Without entropy of mixing, then everything would go directly to the products.
sentences.chinese: 没有混合熵的话，所有的东西都会变成产物。

sentences.english: The image segmentation method based on the maximum entropy of the one-dimensional bound histogram(ODBH) is also used.
sentences.chinese: 同时，也使用一维属性直方图的最大熵分割法。

sentences.english: The perioperative EEG non-linear topographic map of approximate entropy was recorded.
sentences.chinese: 记录围术期近似熵脑电非线性地形图。

sentences.english: In Chapter two, we consider the expansiveness and geometric entropy of group actions on continua.
sentences.chinese: 第二章考虑连续统上群作用的可扩性与几何熵。

sentences.english: The effects of field's initial state and detuning on atomic linear entropies are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了光场的初态和失谐量对原子线性熵的影响。

sentences.english: And the isentropic efficiency and the total pressure ratio decrease with increasing the scales of the tip clearance.
sentences.chinese: 随着叶尖间隙的增加，峰值等熵效率一直降低。

sentences.english: To cheat death, they invented the anti-entropy transformer.
sentences.chinese: 为了逃避死亡，他们实现了反熵的转化。

sentences.english: Then the entropies of the bosons and fermions fields are given by using the brick-wall model.
sentences.chinese: 然后利用砖墙方法计算了玻色场和费米场的熵。

sentences.english: At this point, a new aeon with a low entropy state will begin.
sentences.chinese: 如此，一个新的，低熵的宇宙便可能产生。

sentences.english: Based on minimum thermal resistance and minimized entropy to the fin.
sentences.chinese: 基于最小热阻理论和熵最小化的翅片优化算法。

sentences.english: The chapter two presents the calculation of high dimensions non-stationary black hole entropy.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是关于高维动态黑洞熵的计算。
